name: Rooftop Metal Grate Tile
description: Neo-Tokyo rooftop tile with industrial metal grating.
visualPrompt: Top-down orthographic view of industrial diamond-pattern metal floor grate, steel mesh walkway surface, rusted edges, bolted frame, dark void visible through holes, wet metal reflecting neon cyan and magenta lights, Neo-Tokyo cyberpunk aesthetic, hexagonal tile format, seamless edges, no characters, flat even lighting, 4k texture, anime cel-shaded style.
